name: Reggae
description: A smooth, rhythmic genre from Jamaica known for its laid-back beats, offbeat guitar strums, and themes of peace, love, and social unity.

name: Rock
description: Driven by electric guitars and strong vocals, rock music delivers raw energy, rebellion, and timeless anthems across generations.

name: Electronic
description: Built on synths, beats, and sound design, electronic music explores futuristic rhythms and endless creativity on the dance floor.

name: Jazz
description: A genre rich in improvisation, smooth melodies, and soulful instruments that bring emotion and class to every note.

name: Pop
description: Catchy hooks, upbeat rhythms, and universal appeal make pop music the soundtrack of modern culture and everyday life.

name: Folk
description: Rooted in storytelling and tradition, folk music captures human experiences through acoustic sounds and heartfelt lyrics.

name: Country
description: Blending heartfelt lyrics and twangy guitars, country music tells stories of love, life, and the open road.

name: Classical
description: Timeless orchestral compositions filled with emotion, structure, and artistic brilliance from the masters of music.

name: Hip-Hop
description: A cultural movement that mixes rap, beats, and rhythm to express real stories, creativity, and street art energy.

name: R&B
description: A soulful mix of rhythm and blues that blends emotion, groove, and smooth vocals to create timeless love songs.
